Protocols/NextLevelDelegate.html.name: NextLevelDelegate
Protocols/NextLevelDelegate.html.abstract: NextLevel delegate, provides updates for authorization, configuration changes, session state, preview state, and mode changes.

Protocols/NextLevelDeviceDelegate.html.name: NextLevelDeviceDelegate
Protocols/NextLevelDeviceDelegate.html.abstract: Device delegate, provides updates on device position, orientation, clean aperture, focus, exposure, and white balances changes.

Protocols/NextLevelFlashAndTorchDelegate.name: NextLevelFlashAndTorchDelegate
Protocols/NextLevelFlashAndTorchDelegate.abstract: Flash and torch delegate, provides updates on active flash and torch related changes.

Protocols/NextLevelVideoDelegate.html.name: NextLevelVideoDelegate
Protocols/NextLevelVideoDelegate.html.abstract: Video delegate, provides updates on video related recording and capture functionality.

Protocols/NextLevelPhotoDelegate.html.name: NextLevelPhotoDelegate
Protocols/NextLevelPhotoDelegate.html.abstract: Photo delegate, provides updates on photo related capture functionality.

Protocols.html#/NextLevelDepthDataDelega.name: NextLevelDepthDataDelegate
Protocols.html#/NextLevelDepthDataDelega.abstract: Depth data delegate, provides depth data updates

Protocols/NextLevelPortraitEffectsMatteD.name: NextLevelPortraitEffectsMatteDelegate
Protocols/NextLevelPortraitEffectsMatteD.abstract: Portrait Effects Matte delegate, provides portrait effects matte updates

Protocols/NextLevelMetadataOutputObjects.name: NextLevelMetadataOutputObjectsDelegate
Protocols/NextLevelMetadataOutputObjects.abstract: Metadata Output delegate, provides objects like faces and barcodes

Extensions/FileManager.html#/s:So13NSFil.name: availableStorageSpaceInBytes()
Extensions/FileManager.html#/s:So13NSFil.abstract: Returns the available user designated storage space in bytes.

Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: jpegData(withMetadataDictionary:)
Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Outputs a Data object with the desired metadata dictionary

Extensions/CMSampleBuffer.html#/s:So17CM.name: createSampleBuffer(fromSampleBuffer:withTimeOffset:duration:)

Extensions/CMSampleBuffer.html#/s:So17CM.name: append(metadataAdditions:)
Extensions/CMSampleBuffer.html#/s:So17CM.abstract: Appends the provided metadata dictionary key/value pairs.

Extensions/CIContext.html#/s:So9CIContex.name: uiimage(withSampleBuffer:)
Extensions/CIContext.html#/s:So9CIContex.abstract: Creates a UIImage from the given sample buffer input

Extensions/CIContext.html#/s:So9CIContex.name: uiimage(withPixelBuffer:)
Extensions/CIContext.html#/s:So9CIContex.abstract: Creates a UIImage from the given pixel buffer input

Extensions/CIContext.html#/s:So9CIContex.name: createPixelBuffer(fromPixelBuffer:withOrientation:pixelBufferPool:)
Extensions/CIContext.html#/s:So9CIContex.abstract: Orient a pixel buffer using an exif orientation value.

Extensions/AVCaptureDevice/WhiteBalanceG.name: normalize(_:)
Extensions/AVCaptureDevice/WhiteBalanceG.abstract: Normalize gain values for a capture device.

Extensions/AVCaptureDevice/Position.html.name: isCameraDevicePositionAvailable
Extensions/AVCaptureDevice/Position.html.abstract: Checks if a camera device is available for a position.

Extensions/AVCaptureDevice/Format.html#/.name: maxFrameRate(forFormat:minFrameRate:)
Extensions/AVCaptureDevice/Format.html#/.abstract: Returns the maximum capable framerate for the desired capture format and minimum, otherwise zero.

Extensions/AVCaptureDevice/Format.html#/.name: isSupported(withFrameRate:dimensions:)
Extensions/AVCaptureDevice/Format.html#/.abstract: Checks if the specified capture device format supports a desired framerate and dimensions.

Extensions/AVCaptureDevice.html#/s:So15A.name: captureDevice(withType:forPosition:)
Extensions/AVCaptureDevice.html#/s:So15A.abstract: Returns the capture device for the desired device type and position.

Extensions/AVCaptureDevice.html#/s:So15A.name: wideAngleVideoDevice(forPosition:)
Extensions/AVCaptureDevice.html#/s:So15A.abstract: Returns the default wide angle video device for the desired position, otherwise nil.

Extensions/AVCaptureDevice.html#/s:So15A.name: telephotoVideoDevice(forPosition:)
Extensions/AVCaptureDevice.html#/s:So15A.abstract: Returns the default telephoto video device for the desired position, otherwise nil.

Extensions/AVCaptureDevice.html#/s:So15A.name: primaryVideoDevice(forPosition:)
Extensions/AVCaptureDevice.html#/s:So15A.abstract: Returns the primary duo camera video device, if available, else the default wide angel camera, otherwise nil.

Extensions/AVCaptureDevice.html#/s:So15A.name: videoDevice()
Extensions/AVCaptureDevice.html#/s:So15A.abstract: Returns the default video capture device, otherwise nil.

Extensions/AVCaptureDevice.html#/s:So15A.name: audioDevice()
Extensions/AVCaptureDevice.html#/s:So15A.abstract: Returns the default audio capture device, otherwise nil.

Extensions/AVCaptureDevice.html#/s:So15A.name: focalLengthAndPrinciplePoint(focalLengthX:focalLengthY:principlePointX:principlePointY:)
Extensions/AVCaptureDevice.html#/s:So15A.abstract: Calculates focal length and principle point camera intrinsic parameters for OpenCV.

Extensions/AVCaptureDeviceInput.html#/s:.name: deviceInput(withMediaType:captureSession:)
Extensions/AVCaptureDeviceInput.html#/s:.abstract: Returns the capture device input for the desired media type and capture session, otherwise nil.

Extensions/AVCaptureConnection.html#/s:S.name: connection(withMediaType:fromConnections:)
Extensions/AVCaptureConnection.html#/s:S.abstract: Returns the capture connection for the desired media type, otherwise nil.

Classes/NextLevelSession.html#/s:9NextLe.abstract: Checks if the session’s asset writer is ready for data.

Classes/NextLevelSession.html#/s:9NextLe.abstract: True if the current clip recording has been started.

Classes/NextLevelSession.html#/s:9NextLe.name: currentClipDuration
Classes/NextLevelSession.html#/s:9NextLe.abstract: Duration of the current clip.

Classes/NextLevelSession.html#/s:9NextLe.abstract: Checks if the current clip has video.

Classes/NextLevelSession.html#/s:9NextLe.abstract: Checks if the current clip has audio.

Classes/NextLevelSession.html#/s:9NextLe.abstract: AVAsset of the session.

Classes/NextLevelSession.html#/s:9NextLe.abstract: Shared pool where by which all media is allocated.

Classes/NextLevelSession.html#/s:9NextLe.abstract: Initializer.

Classes/NextLevelSession.html#/s:9NextLe.abstract: Resets a session to the initial state.

Classes/NextLevelSession.html#/s:9NextLe.name: remove(clipAt:removeFile:)

Classes/NextLevelAudioConfiguration.html.abstract: Audio bit rate, AV dictionary key AVEncoderBitRateKey

Classes/NextLevelAudioConfiguration.html.name: sampleRate
Classes/NextLevelAudioConfiguration.html.abstract: Sample rate in hertz, AV dictionary key AVSampleRateKey

Classes/NextLevelAudioConfiguration.html.abstract: Number of channels, AV dictionary key AVNumberOfChannelsKey

Classes/NextLevelVideoConfiguration.html.abstract: Codec used to encode video, AV dictionary key AVVideoCodecKey

Classes/NextLevelVideoConfiguration.html.abstract: Provides an AVFoundation friendly dictionary for configuring output.

Classes/NextLevelConfiguration.html#/s:9.abstract: Provides an AVFoundation friendly dictionary for configuring output.

Classes/NextLevel.html#/s:9NextLevelAAC1.name: previewLayer
Classes/NextLevel.html#/s:9NextLevelAAC1.abstract: Live camera preview, add as a sublayer to the UIView’s primary layer.

Classes/NextLevel.html#/s:9NextLevelAAC4.abstract: Indicates whether the capture session automatically changes settings in the apps shared audio session. By default, is true.

Classes/NextLevel.html#/s:9NextLevelAAC1.abstract: The current capture mode of the device.

Classes/NextLevel.html#/depthDataCapture.abstract: When true, enables streaming depth data capture (use PhotoConfiguration for photos)

Classes/NextLevel.html#/s:9NextLevelAAC6.abstract: Method for providing a NextLevel singleton. This isn’t required for use.

Classes/NextLevel.html.name: NextLevel
Classes/NextLevel.html.abstract: NextLevel, Rad Media Capture in Swift (http://nextlevel.engineering)

Classes/NextLevelClip.html.name: NextLevelClip
Classes/NextLevelClip.html.abstract: NextLevelClip, an object for managing a single media clip

Classes/NextLevelSession.html.name: NextLevelSession
Classes/NextLevelSession.html.abstract: NextLevelSession, a powerful object for managing and editing a set of recorded media clips.

Global Variables.html.abstract: The following global variables are available globally.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
